url.title: Website URL
url.description: The URL of the website to scrape (use this for single scrapes)

urls.title: Multiple URLs (Bulk Mode)
urls.description: Array of URLs to scrape in bulk. Use when bulkMode is true

vaultPath.title: Obsidian Vault Path
vaultPath.description: Absolute path to your Obsidian vault folder

noteName.title: Note Name (Optional)
noteName.description: Custom name for the note. If not provided, will use the page title

folderPath.title: Folder Path
folderPath.description: Subfolder within vault to save notes (relative to vault root)

tags.title: Manual Tags
tags.description: Manual tags to add to the note

autoTag.title: Intelligent Auto-Tagging
autoTag.description: Automatically generate tags from content analysis

autoLink.title: Automatic Internal Linking
autoLink.description: Automatically link related notes based on shared tags

bulkMode.title: Bulk Import Mode
bulkMode.description: Set to true to process multiple URLs at once

updateExisting.title: Update Existing Notes
updateExisting.description: Allow updating of existing notes with fresh content

templatePath.title: Template Path (Optional)
templatePath.description: Path to an Obsidian template file to define scraping parameters and format

rateLimitDelay.title: Rate Limit Delay (ms)
rateLimitDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds between requests in bulk mode

downloadImages.title: Download Images
downloadImages.description: Whether to download images found on the page into the vault

imagesFolder.title: Images Folder
imagesFolder.description: Subfolder inside the note folder to store downloaded images

usePlaywright.title: Use Playwright Mode
usePlaywright.description: Enable Playwright browser automation for JavaScript-heavy sites. Use when CheerioCrawler fails. WARNING: Much slower and more resource-intensive

playwrightTimeout.title: Playwright Timeout (seconds)
playwrightTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for page load in Playwright mode
